sentences.en: "I'm going to come with you."—"Now look, Sue, there's no need."
sentences.cn: “我跟你一起去。”——“休，你看，没这个必要。”

sentences.en: "Sue, you are incorrigible!" he said.
sentences.cn: “休，你真是不可救药！”他说道。

sentences.en: Absent a solution, people like Sue Godfrey will just keep on fighting.
sentences.cn: 假如得不到解决，像休·戈弗雷这样的人就会一直坚持斗争下去。

sentences.en: Anyone who has been in a troubled relationship will sympathise with Sue.
sentences.cn: 那些曾经恋爱不顺利的人都会同情休。

sentences.en: He is being sued for divorce (= in order to end a marriage ) by his wife.
sentences.cn: 他的妻子对他提出起诉，要求离婚。

sentences.en: I bet Sue gave you an earful when you got home.
sentences.cn: 我敢说你到家时休肯定训了你一顿。

sentences.en: I thought Sue would be a good influence on you.
sentences.cn: 我认为苏能对你产生良好影响。

sentences.en: If the builders don’t fulfil their side of the contract, we’ll sue.
sentences.cn: 如果建筑商不履行合同，我们就要提出起诉。

sentences.en: Mr. Warren sued for libel over the remarks.
sentences.cn: 沃伦先生对那些评论提起诽谤诉讼。

sentences.en: One former patient has already indicated his intention to sue.
sentences.cn: 一位以前的病人已经表示要提起诉讼。

sentences.en: Sue and John were especially thrilled with this award.
sentences.cn: 休和约翰对于获得这个奖项感到兴奋不已。

sentences.en: Sue had dressed herself neatly for work.
sentences.cn: 休穿戴整洁地上班去了。

sentences.en: Sue is a thoroughly precocious little madam if ever there was one.
sentences.cn: 休确实是个少见的早熟的小丫头。

sentences.en: Sue let out a terrific shriek and leapt out of the way.
sentences.cn: 休发出一声尖叫，跳到了一边。

sentences.en: Sue never carried anything other than the teeniest purse.
sentences.cn: 休从来都只带着一只小钱包。

sentences.en: Sue screamed, not loudly, more in surprise than terror.
sentences.cn: 休尖叫起来，声音不大，吃惊多于恐惧。

sentences.en: Sue's face lit up with surprise.
sentences.cn: 她一脸惊诧。

sentences.en: The company could be sued for damages.
sentences.cn: 该公司会因所造成的损失被起诉。

sentences.en: The company is suing a former employee.
sentences.cn: 该公司正在起诉一名前雇员。

sentences.en: The name Sue Anne never seemed quite right to Molly.
sentences.cn: 莫莉总觉得休·安妮这个名字不太好听。

sentences.en: The railway may sue for damages (= in order to get money ) because of loss of revenue.
sentences.cn: 铁道部门可能会因收入损失而提出起诉，要求赔偿。

trans.tran_cn: (Sue)人名；(日)末(名)；(法)休；(英)休(女子教名Susan、Susanna的昵称)
控告， 起诉； 要求， 请求
trans.tran_en: to make a legal claim against someone, especially for money, because they have harmed you in some way

trans.tran_cn: 控告，控诉，和…打官司，请求，起诉，提起（诉讼）要求判决

trans.tran_en: to make a legal claim against someone, especially for money, because they have harmed you in some way
